name: Sarana Badal
description: Hello, ENCOURAGE is a project I started with a strong passion to instill the love for reading in little young minds. I myself have been taking solace in books ever since I was young and want to see more children find it too.

name: Bishesh Shrestha
description: I love teaching and being around with the kids. I find kids very joyful. I also have keen interest in reading books.

name: Ananya Dahal
description: Hi everyone. I recently graduated from Kathmandu Model College (KMC). I love kids and want to encourage them to read books and give kids opportunity to learn more things through books.

name: Prabesh Shrestha
description: Hello everyone! I recently completed my A levels from St. Xavier College. I love reading books. With encourage, I want to help other kids too fall in love with books.

name: Priyankush Gautam
description: Hello everyone! I recently completed my A levels from Chelsea International Academy. I enjoy working with the kids and teaching them in a fun learning environment. I personally also do love studying new things by experimenting them.

name: Ridima Rajbhandari
description: Hello everyone! I recently completed my A levels from St. Xavier College. I love reading books. With encourage, I want to help other kids too fall in love with books.

name: Kafina Prajapati
description: Teaching kids have been one of my hobbies, same goes to reading books. I want to see every kids having the opportunity to learn and enjoy it as well.

name: Raisa Shrestha
description: I like kids and would surely love to encourage and teach them .

name: Yaman Mandal
description: I am an adventurous explorer with a heart for kindness, finds joy in discovering new horizons and selflessly lending a hand to those in need.
